background.$description: Header background color. Brand primary for brand identity and visual prominence.

text.$description: Header text color. Inverse (white) for contrast on brand background.

border.$description: Header border color. Transparent as header has brand background.

background.$description: Body background color. White surface for content area.

text.$description: Body text color. Primary text color for readability.

border.$description: Body border color. Transparent as body is separated by header/footer borders.

background.$description: Footer background color. Subtle gray (neutral.100) for visual separation from body.

text.$description: Footer text color. Primary text color for readability.

border.$description: Footer border color. Default border to separate footer from body.

color.$description: Close button color. Inverse (white) to match header text.

hover.$description: Close button hover color. Slightly lighter or with opacity for hover state.
